name: RP API Key
help: An API Key that gives access to Replicate

name: Prompt
value: A realistic top-down image of bunch of small and fully assembled printed circuit boards on a flat conveyer belt with long depth of field
help: The prompt to generate images from

name: Label
help: Images will be added to Edge Impulse with this label

name: Number of images
help: Number of unique images to generate

name: Upload to category
help: Data will be uploaded to this category in your project

name: Aspect Ratio
help: Aspect ratio for the generated image (e.g., '1:1', '16:9')

name: Guidance
help: Controls the balance between adherence to the text prompt and image quality/diversity (2-5) Controls the balance between adherence to the text prompt and image quality/diversity. Higher values make the output more closely match the prompt but may reduce overall image quality. Lower values allow for more creative freedom but might produce results less relevant to the prompt.

name: Interval
help: Increases variance in outputs (1-4) Interval is a setting that increases the variance in possible outputs letting the model be a tad more dynamic in what outputs it may produce in terms of composition, color, detail, and prompt interpretation. Setting this value low will ensure strong prompt following with more consistent outputs, setting it higher will produce more dynamic or varied outputs.

name: Safety Tolerance
help: Safety tolerance, 1 is most strict and 5 is most permissive
